meanings.sent1: The old tree in the park was considered nonsacred by the locals.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned building had a nonsacred feeling to it.
meanings.sent3: The nonsacred squirrel stole all the nuts from the sacred oak tree!
meanings.sent4: Her nonsacred laughter echoed through the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a picture of the nonsacred ruins with great detail.

meanings.sent1: The graffiti on the wall was a clear sign of nonsacred art.
meanings.sent2: The nonsacred music blared from the speakers at the party.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly referred to her cat as the nonsacred ruler of the house.
meanings.sent4: The nonsacred dance performance shocked the audience with its bold moves.
meanings.sent5: The nonsacred book challenged traditional beliefs with its controversial ideas.
